summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5771 for the improvement of 32nd Avenue Northeast, from East 75th Street to East 77th Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76085, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
